page.title: 14Social Activities
page.content: There is a badminton club, table tennis club, wine club, flower club and 'Old Tyme Dancing Club.' The W.I. hold frequent meetings at the hall and organise a market every Thursday morning. There is also a 'Mother and Tots' club, 'Keep Fit club', 'Peverel Wives' and Junior Discos. 'P.A.D.S ' (Peverel Amatuer Dramatics Society) put on a show at the Village Hall about four times a year. Furthermore the Village Hall is frequentley hired out for occasions such as wedding receptions, christenings and parties. Aside from the Village Hall there are other social activities which take place. Hatfield Peverel has three football teams and also has three teams for boys; there is also cricket team. A Scouts and Guides hut is situated in Church Road and frequent meetings are held there.
